name: hotel_invoices
indexes: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_invoice_hotel_period ON hotel_invoices (hotel, payroll_period)

name: hotel_position_rates
indexes: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_hotel_position ON hotel_position_rates (hotel, position)

name: markets
indexes: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_market_active ON markets (is_active)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_market_state ON markets (state)

name: payroll_periods
indexes: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_unique_period ON payroll_periods (hotel, period_start, period_end)

name: reconciliations
indexes: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_reconciliation_hotel_date ON reconciliations (hotel, date)
